title: Acer's Practical Way In Utilizing Twibbonize

content.paragraph: Being advised by their agency firm to use Twibbonize, Acer’s Marketing Communication personnel, Mr. Amor Widjojo finds Twibbonize to be a user-friendly platform. Our various features enable them to remain flexible in doing a campaign. “The most important thing is, our audience could feel how easy it is to use Twibbonize”, he stated.

As a campaign platform, of course we would want our audience to have the convenience of sharing their campaign effectively through social media platforms. For Mr. Amor, this factor offers such benefits to Acer as a brand. “Because in today’s era, everyone is most likely to have their own social media. This makes it easy for our campaign supporters to upload and share their campaign in each of their accounts, then our campaign would easily be viral”, he added.

To this date, Acer has been using Twibbonize for both external and internal occasions. When it comes to their external occasion, Acer usually does campaigns that relate with Education, and would target wide-range of audience. With that being said, it is important for Acer to be able to reach as many people as possible when they do a campaign. Twibbonize is delighted to be able to facilitate Acer in doing such positive campaigns.
